data.title: 303 Fifth Avenue Office Space: The Ultimate Tenant Guide
data.meta_description: Known as the The Jewelry Building, 303 Fifth Avenue office space has a lot to offer for many different types of businesses today.
data.text:
Step into 303 Fifth Avenue office space, where your business’s future becomes as vibrant as the streets of Murray Hill. Since its doors opened in 1909, this iconic structure has transformed from the legendary Jewelry Building to a modern hub for innovators and professionals. With its rich history and a recent makeover that blends classic charm with contemporary flair, it’s not just an office—it’s where you’ll write your next chapter.

From Historic Roots to Contemporary Triumph

Once home to the famous FAO Schwartz, 303 Fifth Avenue stands proud as a landmark of style and substance. Today, its restored facade and elegantly renovated lobby reflect a perfect blend of past and present—setting the stage for your success in an environment that respects legacy and embraces progress.

Your Space, Your Success

Forget the one-size-fits-all approach. Office spaces, spanning 160,000 square feet of Class B area, are designed to adapt to your unique needs. With an average of 8,500 square feet per floor, these offices are perfect whether you’re a nimble startup or a growing business ready to expand your footprint.

Amenities That Elevate Your Workday

At 303 Fifth Avenue, every detail is tailored to make your workday smoother and your business operations more efficient:

Access Anytime: Your office is available whenever inspiration strikes.

Easy Commute: Located near major subway lines and bus routes.

Helpful Concierge: Assistance is just a request away.

Dedicated Management: An on-site team is always ready to support you.

Spacious Environments: High ceilings for a loftier, more open feel.

Located at the Heart of Connectivity

No more commuting woes. Just minutes from the 6 train and a brisk walk to Herald Square‘s transit network, 303 Fifth Avenue positions you perfectly in the city’s transit grid. Whether you’re jetting across town for a meeting or crossing the river to New Jersey, you’re excellently connected.

Join a Thriving Community

At 303 Fifth Avenue, you’ll be in good company with a diverse mix of tenants—from health professionals and legal experts to architects and media mavens. Here, every day is an opportunity to collaborate and grow alongside like-minded professionals who are shaping the future.
